    • Method Detail

      • calendarToString

        public static java.lang.String calendarToString(java.util.GregorianCalendar calendar)
        Take a an object of the class GregorianCalendar and return an string that represents it
        Parameters:
        calendar - instance of the class GregorianCalendar
        Returns:
        An string of the calendar

      • addProject

        public java.lang.String addProject(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String clientName,
                                   double budget,
                                   java.lang.String[] nameManagers,
                                   java.lang.String[] phoneManagers,
                                   java.util.GregorianCalendar initialDatePlanned,
                                   java.util.GregorianCalendar finalDatePlanned)
        Adds a new project to the array of projects if the maximum number of projects has not been reached.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the project.
        clientName - The name of the client.
        budget - The budget allocated to the project.
        nameManagers - An array with the names of the project managers.
        phoneManagers - An array with the phone numbers of the project managers.
        initialDatePlanned - The planned initial date of the project.
        finalDatePlanned - The planned final date of the project.
        Returns:
        A message indicating if the project was added successfully or if the maximum number of projects has been reached.

      • initStages

        public java.lang.String initStages(java.lang.String projectName,
                                   int[] months)
        Initializes the stages of a project with the given name, according to the given array of durations in months.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        months - An array of integers representing the duration in months of each stage.
        Returns:
        A message indicating that the stages have been initialized.

      • getNumManagers

        public int getNumManagers()
        Returns the number of managers that has to be in a project.
        Returns:
        The constant of the number of managers.

      • validateProjectName

        public boolean validateProjectName(java.lang.String name)
        Takes a project name and checks if it is valid (not already used by another project). Returns `true` if the name is valid, `false` otherwise.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the project to validate
        Returns:
        `true` if the project name is valid, `false` otherwise

      • searchProjectByName

        public Project searchProjectByName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a project with the given name. If no project is found with the given name, return null.
        Parameters:
        name - a string representing the name of the project to be searched
        Returns:
        the project with the given name, or null if no such project exists

      • possibleStageTypesInStr

        public java.lang.String[] possibleStageTypesInStr()
        Returns an array of string that contains all of the possibles stagesTypes of a project.
        Returns:
        an array of strings

      • culminateCurrentStage

        public java.lang.String culminateCurrentStage(java.lang.String projectName)
        Take the name of a project and culminate its current stage
        Parameters:
        projectName - the name of the project
        Returns:
        A message in string that can say 3 things. 1 there is no project with this name. 2 all of the project stages were finished. 3 The current stage was finished succesfully

      • searchCapsuleById

        public Capsule searchCapsuleById(java.lang.String id)
        Takes an id an returns a capsule whit this id or null.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the capsule
        Returns:
        If there is no any capsule, return null. Otherwise, returns the capsule.

      • validateIdCapsule

        public boolean validateIdCapsule(java.lang.String id)
        Validate if it is possible to choose the string, that was given as parameter, as an ID of a project
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the capsule
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the id is valid or not

      • possibleCapsuleTypeInStr

        public java.lang.String[] possibleCapsuleTypeInStr()
        Returns an array of strings representing the possible capsule types.
        Returns:
        an array of strings with the possible capsule types.

      • validateCapsuleType

        public boolean validateCapsuleType(java.lang.String capsuleType)
        Checks if a given capsule type is valid.
        Parameters:
        capsuleType - a string representing the capsule type to validate
        Returns:
        true if the capsule type is valid, false otherwise

      • firstValidPosInCapsules

        public int firstValidPosInCapsules()
        Returns the index of the first available position in the capsules array.
        Returns:
        The index of the first null element in the capsules array. Returns -1 if the array is full.

      • addCapsule

        public java.lang.String addCapsule(java.lang.String projectName,
                                   java.lang.String nameCollab,
                                   java.lang.String chargeCollab,
                                   java.lang.String description,
                                   java.lang.String learningExperiences,
                                   java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String type)
        Adds a new capsule to the array of capsules of the current stage of a given project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - the name of the project where the capsule will be added.
        nameCollab - the name of the collaborator who creates the capsule
        chargeCollab - the job title of the collaborator who creates the capsule.
        description - the description of the capsule.
        learningExperiences - the learning experiences associated with the capsule.
        id - the ID of the capsule.
        type - the type of capsule, which must be a valid value from the CapsuleType enum.
        Returns:
        a string message indicating whether the capsule was added or not, and why.

      • approveCapsule

        public java.lang.String approveCapsule(java.lang.String id)
        Approves a capsule with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the capsule to approve
        Returns:
        a message in string indicating if it was possible to approved the capsule, and why.

      • publishCapsule

        public java.lang.String publishCapsule(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String url)
        Publishes a capsule with the given id and url.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the capsule to be published
        url - the url to set for the published capsule
        Returns:
        a message indicating the status of the publishing process

      • searchCollabCapsules

        public java.lang.String searchCollabCapsules(java.lang.String nameCollab)
        This method searches for ONE capsule registered by a collaborator. A name must be given.
        Parameters:
        nameCollab - the name of the collaborator to search for
        Returns:
        a message containing information about one capsule registered by the collaborator, or a message indicating that the collaborator has not registered any capsules

      • countCapsulesByType

        public java.lang.String countCapsulesByType()
        This method counts the number of capsules of each type in all projects.
        Returns:
        a message containing the number of capsules of each type

      • getStageCapsulesInfo

        public java.lang.String getStageCapsulesInfo(java.lang.String projectName,
                                             java.lang.String stage)
        Returns information about the capsules in the specified stage of the specified project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - the name of the project
        stage - the name of the stage
        Returns:
        a string containing information about the capsules in the specified stage of the specified project

      • projectsWithTheGreaterNumberOfCapsules

        public java.lang.String projectsWithTheGreaterNumberOfCapsules()
        This method finds the project(s) with the greatest number of capsules.
        Returns:
        An string that contains name(s) of the project(s) with the greatest number of capsules

      • searchCapsulesByKeyWords

        public java.lang.String searchCapsulesByKeyWords(java.lang.String[] keyWords)
        This method searches for published and approved capsules that contain the given keywords.
        Parameters:
        keyWords - an array of keywords to search for
        Returns:
        information about the capsules that contain the given keywords, or a message indicating that no capsules were found
